info.title: GPSWOX
info.description:
## Welcome

This is a place to put general notes and extra information, for internal use.

To get started designing/documenting this API, select a version on the left. # Title
No Description

post.description: If the request is successfully returned { 'status': 3 'url': ###}. "url" is link to generated report file
The fields depends on the sensor type, which can see the web version.

get.description: Return only devices whose information has changed, all the response returns "time", the time needed to transmit the next request.

post.description: "polygon" first and last coordinate must be the same as it closes Polygone.

number_index.value: Three SOS numbers at the same time

watch.silenceTime: Time interval setting of silence time

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: value will be searched in: name, imei, sim_number, vin, plate_number, registration_number, object_owner, device_model, additional_notes

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Results will be filtered by the specified id

parameters.name: imei
parameters.description: Results will be filtered by the specified imei

parameters.name: sim_number
parameters.description: Results will be filtered by the specified sim number

parameters.name: includes
parameters.description: Specify what additional information should be included (separated by commas)

post.description: "polygon" first and last coordinate must be the same as it closes Polygone.

get.description:
http://[YOUR_URL]/insert.php

uniqueId - device IMEI
protocol - device protocol
altitude - current device altitude in meters
course - current device angle from 0 to 360
latitude - current device latitude
longitude - current device longitude
speed - current device speed in knot unit (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knot_(unit))
fixTime - current device time in timestamp with miliseconds
attributes - key:value your other parameters

post.description: Following a good response save 'user_api_hash' and use it for others requests. It may change in the future if user change a password, when system will return error.

example.address: Woodbourne Road, Brooklands, Trafford, Greater Manchester, North West England, England, United Kingdom
